TopicTitle: Action groups don't work at a certain point in flight (KSP enhanced edition)

Articles.Content:
I built an ssto with rapiers and I was able to do the ascent normally until I needed to deactivate the rapiers so I could run on nuclear engines alone. I assigned them to an action group but when I went to shut them down the action group menu was locked so I had to manually shut them down which took time because I was using a xbox controller to operate the cursor. Eventually the action group menu unlocked for some reason when I was totally out of the atmosphere but I don't know why I wasn't able to use action groups while in the upper atmosphere while all my engines were firing. Can somebody help me resolve this issue?
